SFTkdou8B0s8.code:
const drumBank = "RolandTR909";

samples('shabda/speech/fr-FR/f:merci')
samples('shabda/speech/fr-FR/f:beaucoup')
samples('shabda/speech/fr-FR/f:a')
samples('shabda/speech/fr-FR/f:plus')
samples('shabda/speech/fr-FR/f:dans')
samples('shabda/speech/fr-FR/f:le')
samples('shabda/speech/fr-FR/f:bus')

speak: s("<[merci beaucoup@2][a plus@2 dans le bus]>").clip(1)

melody: note("a [c# a] b, [fb b2] g").sound("piano")
  .slow(2)
  .gain(0.2)

sax: note("<[d@2][[cb f@3] [eb f] a2]>").sound("sax_stacc")
  .release(0.3)
  .hpf(2200)
  .gain(0.7)

synth: note("f#@2 g").sound("gm_fx_soundtrack")
  .slow(2)
  .distort(0.3)
  .release(0.4)
  .velocity(0.3)
  .pan(rand.range(0.3, 0.8))
  .lpf(0)

kick: sound("{bd bd ~ bd}x2").bank(drumBank)
  .delay(0.1)
  .velocity(0.3)

snare: sound("~ sd").bank(drumBank)
  .delay(0.2)
  .velocity(0.2)

hh: sound("hh hh hh hh*4 hh hh hh*4 oh")
  .bank(drumBank)
  .velocity(0.3)
  .gain(0.3)

cowbell: note("[~ d3] b b2 d2*2").sound("cowbell")
  .velocity(1)
  .gain(1.2)
